milestones.title: Idea Consultation & PRD Generation
milestones.description: Capture, refine, and structure the client's idea into a professional Product Requirement Document (PRD).
deliverables: Generation of Initial PRD and project scope
High-level feature outline and recommended tech stack

milestones.title: PRD Review & Technical Planning
milestones.description: Translate the PRD into actionable technical and design documentation.

milestones.title: Core Development (MVP Build)
milestones.description: Develop the product's core functionalities and user-facing components.
milestones.note: This milestone will unlock after the previous milestone is completed and payment is processed.

milestones.title: Quality Assurance & Testing
milestones.description: Ensure the product meets functionality, security, and performance standards.
milestones.note: This milestone will unlock after the previous milestone is completed and payment is processed.

milestones.title: Deployment & Handover
milestones.description: Prepare and deploy the product to a live or staging environment.
milestones.note: This milestone will unlock after the previous milestone is completed and payment is processed.

milestones.title: Post-Launch Support & Optimization
milestones.description: Support client through early launch and user feedback stages.
milestones.note: This milestone will unlock after the previous milestone is completed and payment is processed.
